Draft Rating:

A+

Sean Marks ranks in the 93th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Marks's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 12 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Jarrett Allen with 22th pick but was worth 4th pick.
  • Drafted Nicolas Claxton with 31th pick but was worth 5th pick.
  • Drafted Kessler Edwards with 44th pick but was worth 40th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:

Trade Rating:

C

Sean Marks ranks in the 51th percentile for trading among executives in our database. That's basically average. It could be worse though lol.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Kevin Durant to BRK.
  • Lost Treveon Graham, Shabazz Napier, D'Angelo Russell to GSW.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Seth Curry, Andre Drummond, Ben Simmons, Brice Sensabaugh, future 1st round pick to BRK.
  • Lost James Harden, Paul Millsap to PHI.

Signing Rating:

B+

Sean Marks ranks in the 74th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Kyrie Irving in 2019.
  • Signed Nicolas Claxton in 2022.
  • Signed DeAndre Jordan in 2019.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Isaiah Whitehead in 2016.
  • Signed Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot in 2020.
